ROW.Title: Deliberation for removing four novices and their teacher from the island
ROW.Role_Author: Masser of the Procuratori di Supra
ROW.Fondo: Procuratori di San Marco, De Supra
ROW.Title_Filza: Padri di San Francesco. Santo Spirito
ROW.Synopsis: The Procuratori di Supra order Domenico Porta, guardian of the monastery, to remove from the island the teacher and his four novices (two seculars and two religious) within three days.

EVENT.Event: The teacher and his four novices are removed from the island
